page.title: 02A LANDSCAPE POEM.
page.content: BY JANE AND KERRI The aroma of sweetening hay and misty valleys. Precious green rolling hills. Glistening waters flow on, stretching on as if to nowhere. Trees tower over like giants or skyscrapers soaring over head . A trout jumps out of the water and hits it,with its tail fin cutting and rupturing the surface. Fields of swaying corn rustle in the wind. The crisp fresh grass under foot. The distant murmur of farm machinery. A cool calm day. The wind rippling on the surface of the water. Nothing disturbs it, only the whispering of the wind and the swaying of the trees carrying on......... everlasting.
